pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MyPy2JUnit[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/dundee/mypy2junit.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/dundee/mypy2junit)Script for converting output from MyPy to JUnit XML format## Usage```mypy somedir | mypy2junit > junit.xml```or:```mypy > output.txtmypy2junit output.txt > junit.xml```## Installation```pip install mypy2junit```
